com.rockhoppertech.music.chord

Class RomanChordParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rockhoppertech.music.chord.RomanChordParser

  • public class RomanChordParser
extends Object
    Parse chord strings specified by Weber's roman numeral conventions.
    Author:
    Gene De Lisa

        Uses a major scale based on the specified root.
        Parameters:
        scaleRoot - the root
        romanString - a string in Roman numerals
        Returns:
        a Chord

      • getChord

        public static Chord getChord(String key,
             Scale scale,
             String romanString)
        Scale scale = ScaleFactory.getScaleByName("Major"); Chord foo = RomanParser.getChord("C", scale, "V7b9");
        Parameters:
        key - a Pitch name
        scale - a scale
        romanString - The roman numeral along with the music stuff
        Returns:
        a Chord

      • getChord

        public static Chord getChord(int scaleRoot,
             String scaleName,
             String romanString)
        Chord foo = RomanParser.getChord(Pitch.C5, "Major", "V7b9");
        Parameters:
        scaleRoot - a MIDI number. The octave will be ignored.
        scaleName - a scale name registered with the ScaleFactory
        romanString - The roman numeral along with the music stuff
        Returns:
        a Chord
